then.line: Well! What a day! At least that's all behind us now...
We can finally be alone!
But... what's that?
(CRASH!)
Bark bark!
MINTY WILL RETURN IN....
LOST YOUR MARBLES 2:
MINTY'S ISLAND
Morning Prota! I made breakfast!
And it's your favourite!
Ooh! Good morning tacos?
Yep! Have a seat.
Great! I'll just--hey.
Hm?
Where's Minty?
Minty? She's right...
Oh no.
MINTY WILL RETURN IN....
LOST YOUR MARBLES COUNTRY:
MINTY IN THE CITY
Yes, yes... everything went according to plan.
The Festi-Ball went off without a hitch. No ball of yarn in sight.
You were right. It was...too colourful for this world.
Oho?
Well, we'll have to look into that for next time...
Madam President.
MINTY WILL RETURN IN....
LOST YOUR MARBLES PRESENTS:
MINTY GEAR SOLID
Well! What a wonderful Festi-Ball this has been! And so eventful.
We had an incredible turnout and I truly could not be prouder of the Pomegranate community.
But of course, all good things must come to an end.
And thus, without further ado... I invite our talented emcee to begin our closing ceremony...
The Festi-Ball Rap! Take it away, Mom!
Happy to!
(ahem)
Shout-out, wrestling fans, you're gonna love this bookin'!
Cause it's time to smell what The Mom's got cookin'!
Imma suplex these beats, and then I'll piledrive the track!
Then I'll tag team the next line, and he'll throw it back!
Aw, you're the best.
I'm better than the rest?
Yeah, I'm not much of a rapper.
Well, you're passing my test.
Can I just keep throwing back to you?
For sure, I'm not stressed!
'Kay I think I'll wrap this verse up now.
Who's next at Ball-Fest?
THAT WOULD BE ME.
Oh no.
I've got a riddle for my haters: who's the illest?
YUNG SPHINX!
Lookin' into past and future, who stays chillest?
YUNG SPHINX!
I got prophecies, I'm droppin' beats, who's realest?
Yung Sphinx!
Keep bad vibes and dark foreboding on my kill list!
YUNG SPHINX!
Your hype is gratefully noted. And now I foresee... a dope verse!
Hey get ready, Festi-Ball, I'm here to rock the mic!
Comin' straight outta the Pickle Yard, it's Jon the Spike.
I'm an architect, an eater and a vig-il-ant-e!
Man, who needs to pick one option? I say gimme all three!
Did I hear somebody rap about pickin' options? Sounds like an order for Doc Sandwich!
Heck yeah!
Got my sando booth all set-up at the Festi-Ball!
Cause if someone needs a hero, I'm the one you call.
See that's a sandwich joke, just to explain it to you.
Not like it's brain surgery--though I can do that too.
Anyway, free subs for everybody!
Wow! That's real generous of you, Doc Sandwich!
Oh hey, Randi. Yeah, I'm happy to help. Anyhow, you keep rappin', I gotta go tidy up.
Well now howdy y'all, it's Randi! Mind if I slither in?
I'm the robot-buildin', vintage-sellin', chief in snake skin!
Sure, I may be kinda country, but I'll give rap a shot!
Don't need adlibs, don't need backup, 'cause here comes my hype bot!
GREETINGS I AM RHYMEFINDER, THE ROBOT M.C.
I WILL OPTIMIZE THE VERSES TO AID MY FRIEND RANDI.
I CONTAIN A DICTIONARY AND A MICROPHONE.
WITH RHYMEFINDER IN YOUR CORNER, YOU WILL NOT RAP ALONE.
HELMO C.M. RHYMEFINGER. I ALSO WILL RAP.
INITIATING RAP SUPPORT SEQUENCE.......READY.
THE WEIGHT OF A MEDICINE BALL'S MEASURED IN...
POUNDS.
THE DURATION OF A BILLIARD GAME IS MEASURED IN...
ROUNDS.
HERTZ, PHONS AND SONES AND DECIBELS ARE UNITS OF...
SOUND.
AND MY RHYMES ARE SO ILL, THEY PUT MY HATERS IN THE...
GROUND.
Haha, wow! Y'all make a pretty good duo!
I BELIEVE THAT YOU MEAN "A PRETTY GOOD TRIO".
Aw hey, MinTwo! Great to see ya!
THOUGH I MAY RESEMBLE MINTY, KNOW I AM NO CLONE.
I AM MADE OF STEEL AND WIRES, 'STEAD OF FLESH AND BONE.
I WAS SEEKING MY TRUE PURPOSE BUT IT NOW SEEMS CLEAR.
I MUST JOIN UP WITH THESE ROBOTS FOR A RAP CAREER.
THIS PLEASES RHYMEFINDER.
HAMLO METAL PUPPY. I LOVE YOU.
AND I YOU.
Hey guys! Do you mind if I throw a verse in?
THE STAGE IS YOURS. WE WILL CLAP ALONG.
My name is Croco!
Got rhymes on lock-o!
The Ball Museum's got the lines going down the block-o!
So come on by!
Give us a try!
And for a guided tour, this BOY Boy is your guy!
That was wonderful, Croco! I'm very impressed.
Aw, thanks Mayoress! Are you gonna do one now?
Oh, I suppose I could come up with something...
I WAS BIRTHED BEYOND THE VOID AND TORE THE GATE ASUNDER
CAME TO POMEGRANATE VILLAGE, RAPT IN WONDER
FELL IN LOVE WITH CIVIC DUTY, RAN FOR MAYOR
CRUSHED THE COMPETITION, CALL ME DEMON SLAYER!
Sweet.
Oh! Hello, Teens! Here, take the microphone! Let's have a verse from you.
We're the rulers of the skatepark so we stay on our grind.
We thought we knew just what was cool, no use in changin' our mind.
Then we met a kid named Prota, showed us tricks (so random).
Now we're Festi-Ballin' in the Minty fandom.
Oh how nice! A little tribute rap, that's cute. Now--
Coming through!
Oh! Professor Marbels! So good to see you!
Will you be doing a verse tonight?
Oh, I suppose I could. If you really want me to.
I've no time to teach you physics, but I'll take you to school.
For on the mic, I am a feline who can flex on a fool.
Like my talent, my fierce intellect is rather outsized.
Now sit back and let it hit you: you've just been Marbel-ized!
Wonderful, wonderful! Always such a pleasure.
Thank you, Mayoress. And have you met Besto, my apprentice?
Of course! Besto is a delight! Will you be performing as well, Besto?
Go on, Besto!
Ummm....I...
Come on, Besto! It's easy. Think of it like mathematics.
Uh, sorry, I guess I just...
You can do it Besto!
Prota!
Hi, Mayoress!
Hey, Besto. Don't worry about it. It's okay to be nervous.
If you want, you can just pretend you're talking to me, but with rhymes. It's easy!
...Okay.
Well, this whole day started...with...a fight at the lab?
When...uh... lil' Minty... stormed in and she...was...
Makin' the grab!
Making the grab?
Yeah! Like the expression. "Making the grab". Like when you grab something.
I don't...I don't think that's an expression.
Well, it rhymes!
Okay, fair, fair. "Well this whole day started with a fight at the lab!"
When lil' Minty stormed in...and she was making the grab?
Nice, yeah. She made that grab.
Then my best friend Prota, she got all mixed up!
And well Minty, she just...booked it! Gotta catch that pup!
Oh my gosh, that was so good! You're all so good!
Thank you, Prota. You're very sweet. But you know...
It isn't just the Festi-Ball that brought everyone together today. It was you.
The Mayoress is right! You've really helped a lot of people.
We're proud of you, kiddo.
Aaaw. Well, it wasn't just me. It was Minty!
In fact... I think maybe I'll dedicate my verse to my perfect little puppy!
Oh here's an ode to Minty, she's a--
Bark bark!
Haha, hold on Minty! I'm about to do a rap about--
BARK!
(I'm Pomegranate's most wanted, here to wrap the game!)
(Call me M-I-N-T-Y, whole town be screamin' my name!)
(I'm off the leash, I'm off the chain, I'm goin' off no hitch!)
(Shoulda called it "Lost your Minty", I'm the real boss--)
